title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 277.3 - Authorized hearing officers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 277.3 - Authorized hearing officers

State Regulations

Hearings and proceedings for removal of school officers may
be held before the acting commissioner of education or the
counsel. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
277.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
